summary: This document is an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing travel plans. Staley informs Epstein that he will not arrive until later in the evening, and Epstein apologizes for typos in his previous message.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is communicating with Jeffrey Epstein regarding travel plans.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the email and is discussing his travel schedule.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are in communication regarding travel arrangements, indicating a personal relationship.

keyFacts: The email exchange took place on January 18, 2011.
Jes Staley informed Jeffrey Epstein about his delayed arrival time.
Jeffrey Epstein apologized for typos in his previous email.
